    "file_path": "h2q_project/tests/test_quaternion_ops.py",
    "content": "import unittest
import numpy as np
from h2q_project.quaternion_ops import quaternion_multiply, quaternion_conjugate, quaternion_magnitude, quaternion_normalize

class TestQuaternionOps(unittest.TestCase):

    def test_quaternion_multiply(self):
        q1 = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        q2 = np.array([5, 6, 7, 8])
        expected = np.array([-60, 12, 30, 24])
        result = quaternion_multiply(q1, q2)
        np.testing.assert_array_equal(result, expected)

    def test_quaternion_conjugate(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        expected = np.array([1, -2, -3, -4])
        result = quaternion_conjugate(q)
        np.testing.assert_array_equal(result, expected)

    def test_quaternion_magnitude(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        expected = np.sqrt(30)
        result = quaternion_magnitude(q)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(result, expected)

    def test_quaternion_normalize(self):
        q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
        expected = q / np.sqrt(30)
        result = quaternion_normalize(q)
        np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(result, expected)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()"
  },
  {
    "file_path": "h2q_project/tests/test_fractal_generator.py",
    "content": "import unittest
import numpy as np
from h2q_project.fractal_generator import mandelbrot

class TestFractalGenerator(unittest.TestCase):

    def test_mandelbrot_inside(self):
        c = 0 + 0j
        max_iter = 256
        result = mandelbrot(c, max_iter)
        self.assertEqual(result, max_iter)

    def test_mandelbrot_outside(self):
        c = 2 + 2j
        max_iter = 256
        result = mandelbrot(c, max_iter)
        self.assertLess(result, max_iter)

    def test_mandelbrot_boundary(self):
        c = 0.25 + 0j  # On the boundary of the cardioid
        max_iter = 256
        result = mandelbrot(c, max_iter)
        self.assertGreater(result, 10) # should take a while to escape, at least 10 iterations

if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()"
  }
]
